examples: What is the status of my order?
I want to check my order status
Is my package on the way?
responses: Can you please provide your order ID so I can check the status for you?
Let me look up your order. Could you share your order number?
I'll need your order details to check the status. Please share your order ID.
Your order is being processed. Could you provide your order ID for more details?
I can check that for you. Please provide your order number.

examples: I'm not happy with my purchase
I want to report an issue
responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please provide more details so we can resolve this for you?
We apologize for the inconvenience. Please share your order details so we can assist you.
Your feedback is important to us. Let us know the issue, and we will address it promptly.
I understand your frustration. Can you give us more details about the problem?
We regret the inconvenience caused. Please share your details so we can rectify this.
Yes, we ship internationally. Delivery times may vary based on location.
We offer standard, express, and same-day shipping. Which one do you prefer?
Shipping times depend on your location and selected option. Standard shipping takes 5-7 days.
Delivery charges depend on the shipping method and destination. Would you like details?
Express shipping is available at an additional cost. Let me know if you'd like to proceed.

examples: How do I initiate a return?
What items are eligible for return?
Is there a time limit for returns?
responses: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unused and in original packaging.
You can initiate a return by contacting our support team or visiting the returns section on our website.
Returns are eligible for most items within 30 days. Some restrictions apply.
Free returns are available for certain products. Would you like to know more?
Exchanges are possible for eligible items. Let me know if you'd like to start the process.
